channel.title: Source development
channel.description:
ok well ill make my story short ~ "I want to make my own source" like not 1 off some1 elses base, but like my own, that i code everything into, etc. but i dont know how to start, so i was wondering if any1 whose made there own source before, if they could tell me how to start my own and stuff
thanks a heap
~~slevins~~

item.title: Source development
item.dc:creator: @slevins slevins
item.description:
@slevins wrote:

[center]so all i really gotta do is clean out some other source and retype/code everything O.O[/center]

Read full topic

item.title: Source development
item.dc:creator: @slevins slevins
item.description:
@slevins wrote:

Quote from: TOMSCAPE BETA on July 25, 2008, 06:38:35 am okay how to make a source.. well chnage home for starters

1.go in client.java search for home and change the coords for the home you want ( theres about 4 you must chnage) then save and compile reboot server

  1. adding npcs go to autospawn.cgf itle say:

        spawn = id   xcoord  ycoord   xwalk    walk type  //name
    
  e.g i wanted jad
   spawn = 2745 xcoord ycoord  ignore      0 1 to or 3 ( up to u)  //jad

  2. changing name go to client.java
    search name of server relace with your name of server (ctrl+h).

and just go tut section…

hope this helped some how lol…

That, is called leeching.

If you want to start a new source all by yourself, I suggest you use a clean source, or at Least download any source, and Clean that, by removing all Objects/Npcs/dialogue/codes/minigames etc.

Then re-writing all of the Combat calculations/Skills etc.

the second half of that is what i ment, so i jsut gotta clear most of the stuff there already, and rewrite,
mm i shall work on it another day,

thx tomscape beta :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.description:

1.go in client.java search for home and change the coords for the home you want ( theres about 4 you must chnage) then save and compile reboot server

  1. adding npcs go to autospawn.cgf itle say:

        spawn = id   xcoord  ycoord   xwalk    walk type  //name
    
  e.g i wanted jad
   spawn = 2745 xcoord ycoord  ignore      0 1 to or 3 ( up to u)  //jad

  2. changing name go to client.java
    search name of server relace with your name of server (ctrl+h).

and just go tut section…

hope this helped some how lol…[/quote]

That, is called leeching.

If you want to start a new source all by yourself, I suggest you use a clean source, or at Least download any source, and Clean that, by removing all Objects/Npcs/dialogue/codes/minigames etc.

Then re-writing all of the Combat calculations/Skills etc.
